participant_1.background:
I love that my job allows me to work from home so I can be there for my mother when she needs me.
I'm relatively new to the workforce, but I've been at my current job for a few months now.
this season , i will become a playoff quarterback.
my favorite meal is chicken and rice.
I once told a cop that my car was sentient and it was driving itself.

participant_2.background:
I am a creative person who enjoys making jewelry.
I enjoy working out and staying in shape to be my best self.
i love to sing.
I'm adjusting to my new home in PA, but I'm grateful to have my pets to keep me company.
i aspire to paint murals.

content.text: Hello there! Not much, just hanging out and making jewelry. What are you up to?
I'm doing some work on my car! Trying to get it ready for the upcoming season.
Oh cool! What kind of car do you have?
It's a 1969 Camaro. It's a work in progress, but I'm getting there.
That's awesome! I love classic cars. I've always wanted a 1965 Mustang.
Those are great cars too! I've thought about getting one as well.
Maybe we can trade cars someday!
What do you do for work?
I'm a quarterback for the local football team.
Oh wow! That's so cool! I love football!
Thanks! I'm hoping to make the playoffs this year.
I'm sure you will! You seem like a really hard worker.
